20101226141519.000|20101226141520.000|CC1|YOU SAY WHEN YOU ARE VIEWING    
20101226141520.000|20101226141521.000|CC1|YOUR PORTFOLIO, YOU WANT TO KEEP
20101226141521.000|20101226141521.000|CC1|YOUR EYE ON TWO THINGS.         
20101226141521.000|20101226141522.000|CC1|WHAT ARE THEY?                  
20101226141522.000|20101226141522.000|CC1|>> THE FIRST IS THAT IF YOU HAVE
20101226141522.000|20101226141523.000|CC1|SOME DOGS IN YOUR PORTFOLIO, YOU
20101226141523.000|20101226141524.000|CC1|WANT TO THINK ABOUT GETTING RID 
20101226141524.000|20101226141527.000|CC1|OF THEM AT THE END OF THE YEAR. 
20101226141527.000|20101226141528.000|CC1|THE REASON IS THAT              
20101226141528.000|20101226141530.000|CC1|YOU CAN TAKE THOSE LOSSES TO    
20101226141530.000|20101226141531.000|CC1|OFFSET YOUR GAINS ON OTHER      
20101226141531.000|20101226141532.000|CC1|STOCKS AND MUTUAL FUNDS THAT YOU
20101226141532.000|20101226141533.000|CC1|MIGHT HAVE SOLD THROUGH THE YEAR
20101226141533.000|20101226141534.000|CC1|AND REDUCE YOUR TAXES.          
20101226141534.000|20101226141536.000|CC1|THE OTHER THING IS A LOT OF     
20101226141536.000|20101226141537.000|CC1|PEOPLE AREN'T SURE, WELL, WHAT  
20101226141537.000|20101226141538.000|CC1|KIND OF INVESTMENT SHOULD I HAVE
20101226141538.000|20101226141539.000|CC1|IN MY RETIREMENT ACCOUNTS VERSUS
20101226141539.000|20101226141542.000|CC1|MY OTHER TAXABLE ACCOUNTS?      
20101226141542.000|20101226141545.000|CC1|IF YOU'VE GOT ACTIVELY TRADING  
20101226141545.000|20101226141547.000|CC1|MUTUAL FUNDS, THOSE ARE FUNDS   
20101226141547.000|20101226141549.000|CC1|THAT PUT OFF A LOT OF EARNINGS  
20101226141549.000|20101226141551.000|CC1|AND, THEREFORE, GENERATE TAX    
20101226141552.000|20101226141552.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:15:00 of 2:00:00
20101226141551.000|20101226141552.000|CC1|DOLLARS FOR YOU TO PAY, THEN    
20101226141552.000|20101226141553.000|CC1|THINK ABOUT PUTTING THOSE IN    
20101226141553.000|20101226141554.000|CC1|YOUR RETIREMENT ACCOUNTS BECAUSE
20101226141554.000|20101226141555.000|CC1|IT SHIELDS THEM FROM THOSE      
20101226141555.000|20101226141556.000|CC1|TAXES.                          
20101226141556.000|20101226141557.000|CC1|>> AND YOU ALSO ADVISE THAT     
20101226141557.000|20101226141558.000|CC1|PEOPLE SHOULD GO AHEAD AND MAX  
20101226141558.000|20101226141600.000|CC1|OUT THEIR RETIREMENT 401(k)     
20101226141600.000|20101226141602.000|CC1|ACCOUNTS.                       
20101226141602.000|20101226141603.000|CC1|OVER THE PAST FEW YEARS, WE'VE  
20101226141603.000|20101226141605.000|CC1|SEEN SOME COMPANIES WITHDRAW    
20101226141605.000|20101226141605.000|CC1|FROM DOING THAT, GIVEN THE      
20101226141605.000|20101226141606.000|CC1|ECONOMY.                        
20101226141606.000|20101226141607.000|CC1|YOU'RE SAYING NOW IT'S TIME TO  
20101226141607.000|20101226141610.000|CC1|GO BACK IN.                     
20101226141610.000|20101226141611.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.                  
20101226141611.000|20101226141613.000|CC1|STILL 401(k), 403B, ONE OF THE  
20101226141613.000|20101226141614.000|CC1|BEST WAYS TO SAVE MONEY.        
20101226141614.000|20101226141615.000|CC1|MORE ARE COMING BACK TO MATCHING
20101226141615.000|20101226141616.000|CC1|YOUR DOLLARS.                   
20101226141616.000|20101226141619.000|CC1|THE MAXIMUM THAT YOU CAN PUT    
20101226141619.000|20101226141620.000|CC1|AWAY IS $16,500.                
20101226141620.000|20101226141623.000|CC1|IF YOU'RE 50 OR OLDER, ANOTHER  
20101226141623.000|20101226141625.000|CC1|$5,500 YOU CAN PUT AWAY.        
20101226141625.000|20101226141626.000|CC1|SO, VERY IMPORTANT TO TAKE      
20101226141626.000|20101226141628.000|CC1|ADVANTAGE OF THAT.              
20101226141628.000|20101226141629.000|CC1|>> AND YOU SHOULD ALSO CHECK HOW
20101226141629.000|20101226141630.000|CC1|MUCH IS BEING WITHHELD BY YOUR  
20101226141630.000|20101226141631.000|CC1|EMPLOYER?                       
20101226141631.000|20101226141631.000|CC1|>> YEAH, YOU KNOW, A LOT OF     
20101226141631.000|20101226141633.000|CC1|PEOPLE DON'T REALIZE THAT THE   
20101226141633.000|20101226141634.000|CC1|AMOUNT YOU HAVE WITHHELD CAN
